RAM 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in RAM vehicles. Curious to know what RAM model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on RAM 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of RAM models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific RAM model changed across years or compare between different models of the RAM family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official RAM 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest RAM cars

RAM 1500 0-60 5.9 - 9.6 sec 1/4 mile 14.2 @ 100 - 17.1 @ 81 mph
RAM 2500 0-60 6.6 - 9.1 sec 1/4 mile 14.8 @ 96 - 17.3 @ 80 mph
RAM Cargo 0-60 6.8 - 7 sec 1/4 mile 15.4 @ 89 - 15.5 @ 89 mph
RAM 3500 0-60 7 - 10.3 sec 1/4 mile 15.1 @ 92 - 17.4 @ 79 mph
RAM ProMaster 2500 0-60 7.7 - 7.9 sec 1/4 mile 16.1 @ 90 - 16.3 @ 88 mph
RAM ProMaster 1500 0-60 7.8 - 8 sec 1/4 mile 16 @ 90 - 16.5 @ 84 mph
RAM ProMaster 3500 0-60 7.9 - 8.1 sec 1/4 mile 16.1 @ 89 - 16.3 @ 88 mph
RAM ProMaster 2500 Window Van 0-60 8 sec 1/4 mile 16.2 @ 88 mph
RAM ProMaster 3500 Window Van 0-60 8 - 8.2 sec 1/4 mile 16.2 @ 88 - 16.5 @ 83 mph
RAM ProMaster City 0-60 9.3 - 10 sec 1/4 mile 17.6 @ 81 - 19.1 @ 76 mph
